===Etymology===
From {{m|ja|モテる|モテない|unpopular|tr=motenai}} + {{m|ja|男||man; male}}. {{m|ja|モテる|モテない|tr=motenai}} was shortened to {{m|ja|モ|tr=mo}} and was assigned the kanji {{m|ja|喪||mourning|tr=mo}}.
